loans.name: Shukriya

texts.en:
Shukriya is a 55-year-old mother of two young men and two daughters. One of the daughters has already married. 

Her husband Ali started helping with her tailoring business at home after he retired from his job. Shukriya started her tailoring and sewing business 20 years ago on a small scale at home and has kept it that way till now. 

She used to sew traditional dresses and other clothes by hand at first, then started using a sewing machine. But now she wants to improve the business and increase her productivity so she applied for a loan to buy an electronic sewing machine that is connected to a computer so she can achieve her goal.

Because Shukriya is a conservative person, her husband Ali has agreed to appear in the photo.

loans.use: to buy an electronic sewing machine that is connected to a computer.

loans.name: Naema

texts.en:
Naema is a 49-year-old lady, who has 2 daughters and one son. She dedicated all her time to her kids till they are now college students, and because of that she could not find a good job opportunity. 

Naema has a talent for making clothes from wool, and she used to make blouses and scarves, and gloves for her children. Now that two of her older children have entered college, Naema deicded to follow her passion and start a small business making clothes from wool to sell.

It has been two years now since she started, and people have started to recognize her and her work. She even was able to reach to some of the clothes shops to sell what she makes. Now Naema has applied for a loan to work on increasing her products and start working with wholesale traders so she can provide them with the required quantity and reach out to a bigger market.

loans.use: To buy more materials used for knitting clothes.

loans.name: Watoka Mbali Group

texts.en:

The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance. 

David takes care of nine children at home. He joined One Acre Fund in order to grow enough to secure food for his family and to have additional maize profits to send his children to school. In the recent 2011 season, David had a good maize yield harvesting 7 bags on ½ an acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, David was only able to harvest 1/2 a bag of maize on ½ acre of land. 

With income from maize sales, David will educate his children and invest in livestock rearing and business as savings for future use. In 2012, the members of Watoka Mbali group will each plant maize plots of between ½ and 1 acre of land.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Safaa

texts.en:
Safaa is now a 27-year-old single lady who lives with her parents. She is the youngest member of her four brothers and sisters. 

Safaa opened a small food store where she mostly sells snacks for the kids in the neighborhood, so she can help her family financially. It has been three years now since she started, and her brother Mohammad sometimes helps her by taking shifts so she can rest.

Now Safaa has applied for a loan to offer more food products like sugar, rice, etc to reach more customers. Because Safaa is a conservative person, she asked her brother Mohammad to appear in the picture instead of her.

loans.use: to offer more food products like sugar, rice, etc. to serve more customers.

loans.name: Taghreed

texts.en:
Taghreed is a 49-year-old lady who has been selling clothes at home for the last four years to help her husband who owns a restaurant to support their family of 10 members.

Taghreed has now applied for a loan to add more winter clothes to what she sells so she can increase her profit and open a store to sell clothes.

loans.use: To add more winter clothes to what she sells.

loans.name: Heba

texts.en:
Heba is a 31-year-old married lady. Three years ago, she started a small retail business selling bed covers and sheets, and during this time she was able to expand by selling blankets, too.

Now she has a special room in her house decorated specifically for this business, using her connections and her husband's connections. He has a shop to sell curtains; Heba now has a wide customer base in their area and their close neighborhood, too.

Heba has applied for this loan in order to offer more blankets and start separating her business from home by looking for an independent store near by.

loans.use: to buy more blankets for sale.

loans.name: Siham

texts.en:
Siham, 55 years old, is a divorced lady and lives in Madaba.

Siham opened a small boutique three years ago to sell clothes at reasonable and affordable prices, and that attracted a lot of people in the neighborhood to buy from her. Now she has applied for a loan to bring in more winter clothes to be able to cover the seasonal demand.

loans.use: to bring in more winter clothes to be able to cover the seasonal demand.

In the recent 2011 season,  Biliah had a very good maize yield, harvesting 9 bags on 1 acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund,  Biliah was only able to harvest 3 bags of maize on 1 acre of land.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to  Biliah  and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from maize sales,  Biliah will educate her children and invest in livestock rearing.

In 2012, the members of Vasale B group will each plant  between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

The picture shows  Biliah and her group with the field officer.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Seeta

texts.en:
Seeta is a 39-year-old single lady, the oldest among her sisters and one brother. She lives with her parents.

Seeta started a small tailoring business seven years ago by opening a small workshop with one sewing machine, Seeta is specialized in making curtains. Now she wants to add another service, making bedsheets and covers, so she applied for a loan to buy  the material and tools that she needs to start her new service.

loans.use: to buy  the material and tools that she needs to start making bed covers and sheets.

loans.name: Worood

texts.en:
Worood is a 31-year-old single lady who lives with her parents. She works in a company that is located in one the Jordanian universities.

Three years ago she bought a few sheep and goats for her mother Nawal (who appears in the photo) to get milk to make yogurt out of for sale. Now Worood wants to increase the number of goats that she has to increase their productivity as there is more demand for the products her mom makes, and that’s why she has applied for this loan.

Because Worood is a conservative person, she asked her mother Nawal to appear in the photo instead of her.

loans.use: to buy more goats.

loans.name: Hayat

texts.en: Hayat is a 44-year-old Lebanese married woman. She lives with her husband and has two working children. All of the family cooperates together especially because of the heavy costs of life.  Hayat had fifteen years of experience in selling detergents until she decided to open her own business in 2006. She sells all kinds of detergents from her home. Her husband has been working as a taxi driver for the past twenty three years. Today, she’s looking to borrow $ 2300 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to increase her inventory of cleaners and sanitary products in order to earn superior income. In the future she plans to open her own shop.

loans.use: to increase her inventory of cleaners and sanitary products.

loans.name: Fayza

texts.en:
Fayza is a 19-year-old lady, who is married to Mohammad, 24 years old, and has a baby boy.

Her husband Mohammad has six years' tailoring experience, and he also has a small workshop for sewing and tailoring. Fayza wanted to help her husband so they can provide their son with a comfortable life specially as they are both still young, so she learned the business from her husband and started working with him.

Fayza has found out that working with her husband every day has brought them closer to each other, so she decided to continue what she is doing and applied for this loan to register their workshop officially.

Both Fayza and her husband appear together in the picture.

loans.use: To register the tailoring workshop.

loans.name: Intisar

texts.en:
Intisar is a 47-year-old married woman who has six sons and one daughter.

To be able to support their big family, Intisar saw that she can help her husband who works as a taxi driver, so five years ago, Intisar started making and arranging artificial flowers at home and selling them in baskets. 

Now she has applied for a loan in order to buy more material to make more artificial flowers to sell in the market to the shops and also to people they know or the neighbors.

loans.use: to buy more material to make more artificial flowers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy products for his business such as a Gipson board.

loans.name: Valentine

texts.en:
Valentine is 28 years old and is married with two children aged between 3 and 6 years old.  Valentine sells various goods such as: cooking oil, biscuits, eggs, sugar etc. Her business is well known and well organized and has six years of experience in this business. She currently employs one person to help her and she works from 6am to 7pm per week. 

Valentine has requested the loan from Kiva, via Vision Finance Company, in order to purchase various goods such as: cooking oil, biscuits, eggs, sugar etc. to sell. With any profits, Valentine will be able to save money for her future, reinvest in her business and she will be able to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to purchase various goods such as: cooking oil, biscuits, eggs, sugar, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Duo Las Marias Group

texts.es:
DUO LAS MARIAS
Doña Claudia Marisol  ella se dedica a la elaboración de tejidos típicos a mano y a la crianza de pollos gracias a dios a podido salir adelante ya que es el único medio que tiene para poder apoyar a sus padres, ella necesita un capital para poder invertir mas para sus tejidos y asi obtener un poco mas de ingresos económicos.esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos tipicos.

Doña Marisol es una mujer que se dedica a la venta de refacción en una escuela publica en horas de la mañana y en horas de la tarde vende refacción en la plaza municipal de la localidad ella se dedica a esta actividad para poder apoyar a sus padres y para que ella pueda terminar sus estudios ya que gracias al esfuerzo de ella ha podio salir adelante, ella sueña con que algún día pueda tener un negocio un poco mas grande y así poder apoyar un poco mas a sus padres porque son de escasos recursos
texts.en:
Duo Las Marias [The Marias Duo]

Claudia Marisol makes a living doing traditional weaving by hand and raising chickens. Thanks to God she has been able to succeed because this is the only means to support her parents. She needs capital to further invest in her textiles and therefore obtain extra income. She is applying for this loan to purchase raw material for weaving traditional textiles.

Marisol is a woman who sells refreshments in a public school in the morning hours and in the afternoon hours she sells refreshments in the town square. She does this to support her parents and so that she can finish her studies. Through her own effort, she has been able to succeed. She dreams of someday owning a larger business and being able to support her parents more, since they have few resources.

loans.use: to purchase raw material for weaving.

loans.name: Philomene

texts.en:
Philomene is 45 years old and is married. She has five children, aged between 7 and 31 years old. She takes care of one dependent who is 12 years old. Philomene sells various goods such as: colgate, lotions, pens, etc. Her business is well known and well organized and she has 12 years of experience in this business. She currently employs six people to help her and she works from 6am to 7pm daily, all week except on Saturday. 

Philomene has requested her loan from Kiva, via Vision Finance Company, in order to purchase various goods such as: Colgate, lotions, pens, etc to sell. With any profits, Philomene will be able to save money for her future, reinvest in her business and she will be able to pay children school fees.

loans.use: to purchase various goods such as: colgate, lotions, pens, etc to sell.

loans.name: Nabih

texts.en: Nabih is a 54-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and one school aged child. Hie is the main source of income for the family and works really hard to offer them a fair way of living. He is a professional dentist. He has owned a dental clinic for the past twenty five years and looks forward to further growing his business. His wife is also employed, and works as a teacher in a local school. Today, he’s asking to borrow $1600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to renovate and change the interior design of his clinic in order to keep it modern and proper. In the future he plans to take more Kiva loans and purchase additional technological equipment in order to offer his customers a better service.

loans.use: to renovate and change the interior design of his clinic.

loans.name: Diane

texts.en:
Diane is 31 years old and is married. She has three children, aged between 1 and 8 years old. She takes care of one dependent who is five years old. Diane sells various goods such as: lotions, African clothes, radios, etc. Her business is well known and well organized and she has six years of experience in this business. She currently employs two people to help her and she works from 6am to 7pm daily, all week except on Saturday. 

Diane has requested her loan from Kiva, via Vision Finance Company, in order to purchase various goods such as: lotions, African clothes, radios, etc. to sell. With any profits, Diane will be able to save money for her future, reinvest in her business and she will be able to pay children school fees.

loans.use: to purchase various goods such as: lotions, African clothes, radios, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Segundo Augurio

texts.es:
Segundo Augurio tiene 27 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con la madre en Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar.
Es integrante de la VRC PANGUA, se encuentra ubicado en la comunidad Pangua  Chaupiyacu, Parroquia Guanujo Cantón Guaranda, La comunidad esta a 15 minutos de la Oficina Los miembros de la Ventanilla Pangua se dedican la mayoría a la Agricultura y ganadería y también a otras actividades donde obtienen mayores ingresos económicos como: el comercio y la construcción.
Segundo se dedica a la Ganadería, agricultura y también se dedica a  ser albañil. Las compras los realiza en Guaranda. Solicita el crédito para comprar un terreno para poder trabajar en la siembra de maíz.
Con la ayuda del préstamo podrá mejorar la situación económica, El sueño es poder comprar un terreno. Los desafíos a los que se ha enfrentado es la sequía falta de agua a los cultivos.
En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar o también hacer deporte
texts.en:
Segundo Augurio is twenty-seven, single, and has no children. He lives with his mother in the Guaranda province of Bolivar.  He belongs to the Pangua village bank in the Pangua Chaupiyacu community in Guanjo Parish in the Guaranda canton. The community if fifteen minutes from the the office.  Most of the members of the Pangua office earn their living in agriculture, cattle farming, and other activities in which they can earn better incomes like commerce and construction.  Segundo works in cattle farming and agriculture.  He's also a mason.  He makes his purchases in Guaranda.  

Segundo is seeking a loan to buy a plot of land so he can plant corn.  With help from the loan, he'll be able to improve his financial situation.  His dream is to be able to buy some land.  The challenge he faces is the drought and lack of water for his crops.

In his spare time, Segundo likes to rest or engage in sports.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land for planting corn.

loans.name: Fidancie

texts.en:
Fidancie is 36-years-old and is married with one child who is 2-years-old. She takes care of three dependents and two relatives. Fidancie sells various goods such as lotions, sugar, soap, toilet paper, etc. Her business is well known and well organized and she has two years of experience in this business. She currently employs one person to help her and she works from 9am to 8pm each day except on Sunday. 

Fidancie has requested her loan from Kiva via Vision Finance Company. With any profit, Fidancie will be able to reinvest in her business and she will be able to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to purchase various goods such as lotions, sugar, soap, toilet paper, etc., to sell.

loans.name: Segundo Manuel

texts.es:
Segundo Manuel tiene 27 años de edad es casado tiene dos hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos de 4 y 1 año  de edad en  Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar.
Es integrante de la VRC PANGUA, se encuentra ubicado en la comunidad Pangua  Chaupiyacu, Parroquia Guanujo Cantón Guaranda, La comunidad está a 15 minutos de la Oficina Los miembros de la Ventanilla Pangua se dedican la mayoría a la Agricultura y ganadería y también a otras actividades donde obtienen mayores ingresos económicos como: el comercio y la construcción.
Segundo se dedica a la construcción tiene sembríos de papas posee casa propia. Las compras y las ventas los realiza en Guaranda.
Solicita el crédito para comprar ganados. Con la ayuda del préstamo podrá cambiar la situación de vida en la familia e hijos.
El sueño es poder comprar un carro y una casa. Los desafíos a los que se ha enfrentado es el problema en las semillas.
En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar, descansar, pasar el tiempo con los hijos.

.
texts.en:
Segundo Manuel, age 27, is married and has two children.  He lives with his wife and children, ages 4 and 1, in Guaranda province in Bolívar.  He is a member of the Pangua communal bank in the Panguag Chaupiyacu community, Guajujo parish, Guaranda Cantón.  The community is 15 minutes from the office. 

 The majority of the members of the communal bank devote themselves to farming and livestock.  There are also other business activities where they get greater income like commerce and construction.

Segundo devotes himself to construction.  He has potato crops, and he has his own house.  He makes his purchases and sales in Guaranda.

He is requesting the loan to buy livestock.  With the help from the loan he will be able to change the conditions of life for his family and his children.

His dream is to be able to buy a car and a house.  The challenge he has faced is the problem with the seeds.  

In his free time he likes to play, to rest, and to spend time with the children.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 60 years old and he is married. He takes care of four relatives. Joseph has four years' experience breeding cows. The hours of his business are from 8am to 2pm, daily. 

Joseph has requested a loan from Kiva lenders in order to expand his breeding by buying cows for resale. With profits from the loan, Joseph would like to satisfy his family's basic needs and start saving for his future.

loans.use: to expand his breeding by buying cows for resale.

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en: Hasan is  23 years old, single and lives with his parents and one sibling. His father works for the local municipality while Husan earns a living selling car accessories in a shop he opened in 2007. He also works on the side as a barber in a salon he owns. He is applying for a loan for $1,100 from Kiva partner Ameen to buy more car accessories to sell to his customers. He believes that this loan will allow him to improve his business and increase his profits. His goal for the future is to expand his car accessories shop.

loans.use: to buy new car accessories to sell to his customers.

loans.name: Bebiana

texts.en:
Forty-six-year-old Bebiana is a married woman with seven children. She lives in the town of Trinidad, Bohol, with her family.

Bebiana sells fruits and vegetables to her community. She has been doing this for five years. Bebiana earns 7,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) per month with her business.

Bebiana has requested a loan to buy more bananas and vegetables to sell. Bebiana hopes to earn more and be able to sustain her children's education and make improvements to their house.

loans.use: to buy more bananas and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Duo San Francisco La Jiralda Group

texts.es:
DUO SAN FRANCISCO
Doña Reyna es una persona trabajadora que diariamente se dedica a su negocio ella se dedica a la venta de ropa típica y también se dedica a la crianza de animales ella tiene bajo su responsabilidad sus cuatro hijos menores de edad,  que necesitan mucho el apoyo de ella , gracias a dios ella ha podido Sacar adelante a sus hijos a pesar de muchas dificultades que ella a pasado  en su vida, desde la muerte de su esposo ella se ha dedicado a cuidar a sus hijos y sacarlos  adelante, ella necesita el credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos, y así obtener mas ganancia y darles una educación mejor a sus hijos. Don Edgar, es una persona  trabajador que solo quiere lo mejor para su familia junto con su esposa quieren darle  a sus hijos una educación mejor y tener un futuro mejor , el tiene un pequeño negocio de estudio de publicidad, y que ahora necesita un capital para poder engrandarlo y dar un  mejor servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
‘DUO SAN FRANCISCO’ 

Reyna is an industrious woman who works on her business every day. She sells traditional clothes and also breeds animals. She is responsible for her four young children, who are very reliant on her support. Thankfully she has managed to help her children get ahead in spite of the many difficulties she has faced during her life. Since her husband died, Reyna has looked after the children and helped them to progress. She needs the loan to buy raw materials for making fabrics, so that she can increase her profits and give her children a better education. 

Edgar is a hardworking man who just wants the best for his family. Together with his wife, he wants to give his children a better education and have a better future. He has a small business - an advertising agency. Edgar now needs capital so that he can grow the business and provide his clients with a better service.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for making fabrics.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es: Luz Marina tiene su actividad que es una pulpería, desde hace mas de 8 años que tiene este medio de vida. Ella ha sido una mujer responsable y emprendedora por lo que se siente orgullosa de tener un medio de trabajo. El negocio lo inicio hace 8 años, cuando se caso y decide establecer su negocio para generar ingresos a su hogar. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de granos básicos, golosinas, refrescos, pan, detergentes y huevos.
texts.en:
Luz Marina has had a grocery store for over eight years.  She has been a responsible and enterprising woman.  She feels proud to have a means of working.

She started her business eight years ago.  When she got married she decided to establish her business in order to generate income for her household.

She will use the loan to buy basic grains, sweets, soft drinks, bread, detergent, and eggs.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, sweets, soft drinks, bread, detergent, and eggs.

loans.name: Crispina

texts.en:
48-year-old Crispina is a married woman from Trinidad, Bohol. She has five children with ages ranging from 7 to 21.

Crispina has had a sari-sari (variety) store business for 5 years. She sells items like biscuits, coffee, and canned goods. Aside from managing the store, Crispina also grows rice crops and raises pigs. She requested a loan to buy fertilizers, feeds, and more items to sell. Crispina hopes to send all her children to school.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers, feed, and more items to sell.

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en:
Mohamad is a 62-year-old Lebanese married man. He lives with his wife and has three children who are all working. Since his family depends on him and needs his support, Mohamad works nonstop to fulfill their needs. 

Mohamad started his own business as a taxi driver in 2009, and is looking forward to gain more clients. He’s good, welcoming, and friendly, which makes people loyal to him. Today, he’s requesting to borrow $1000 from Kiva partner Ameen S.a.l to perform needed maintenance on his car. He’s sure that this will enhance his business and make him earn superior income. In the future, he plans to collect money and hire someone to work on his behalf.

loans.use: To perform needed maintenance on his car.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en: Cristina is a 29-year-old woman from Trinidad, Bohol. She has been engaged in seaweed farming for 2 years. She earns 4000 Philippines pesos (PHP) per month with this business. Cristina does her best to improve her business. She requested a loan to buy seaweed seedlings, straw, and other materials. Cristina hopes to earn better and be able to save for her future family.

loans.use: To buy seaweed seedlings, straw, and other materials.

loans.name: Souknah

texts.en:
Souknah is a 27-year-old married Lebanese woman living with her husband and two children. In order to take some responsibilities off of her husband, she decided to open her own studio. For this reason she started to work as a photographer in 2005. As for her husband, he’s also an event photographer and has been working in this domain for the past twenty-five years. 

Today she’s asking to borrow $3000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase new photography equipment such as cameras, film, photo frames, and many other items. In the future, she plans to open a photography center with the cooperation of her husband.

loans.use: To purchase new photography equipment such as cameras, film, photo frames, and many other items.

loans.name: Manuela De Jesus

texts.es: Manuela De Jesús trabaja como técnica de estadística en el hospital. Ella tiene dos hijas bajo su cargo de 12 y 16 años. El motivo de este crédito es para la compra de materiales de construcción como arena, bloques, cemento entre otros. Manuela quería realizar estas mejoras desde hace mucho tiempo y por la falta de dinero no había podido obtenerlas. Ella es una mujer responsable y quiere dejarles a sus hijas un futuro prometedor.
texts.en:
Manuela De Jesús works as a statistical technichian in the hospital.  She has two daughters, ages 12 and 16, under her care.

This loan is to buy construction materials like sand, cement blocks, cement, and others.  Manuela has wanted to make these improvements for a very long time.  She has not been able to do so for lack of money.

She is a responsible woman who wants to leave her daughters a promising future.

loans.use: to buy construction materials like sand, cement blocks, cement, and others.

loans.name: Duo Luz Divina Group

texts.es:
DUO LUZ DIVINA
Doña Elba Rosmery es una mujer trabajadora que cuenta con un pequeño  negocio de artesanías y venta de ropa típica, desde temprano ella se dedica a elaborar sus tejidos típicos para terminarlos lo antes posible y poder venderlos, en los días de mercado ella  sale a vender ropa típica, ya que es el único medio que tiene para poder apoyar a su familia, tiene bajo su responsabilidad a su dos hijos menores de edad que necesitan el cuidado y el apoyo de sus padres ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos, y tener mas ganancias. Doña María Susana es una persona trabajadora que quiere salir adelante, ella se dedica a la elaboración de tejidos típicos a mano y a crianza de animales , desde hace años ella se ha dedicado a estas actividades para poder darles a sus hijos una vida mejor , ella necesita un capital para poder comprar mas materia prima para sus tejidos y mas concentrado a sus animales.
texts.en:
DUO LUZ DIVINA: 

Elba Rosmery is a hardworking woman who has a small business selling crafts and traditional clothing. Starting early in the day, she makes her traditional fabrics, so that she can to finish them as soon as possible and be able to sell them. 

On market days, she sells tradition clothing as it is the only means she has to support her family. She is responsible for her two children who are minors and who need the care and support of their parents. She is requesting this loan in order to purchase raw materials for making fabrics, and have more profits.

María Susana is a hard worker who wants to get ahead. She makes a living making traditional fabrics by hand and in animal husbandry. For years she has devoted herself to these businesses in order to give her children a better life. She needs capital in order to buy more raw materials for her fabrics and more feed for her animals

loans.use: to buy raw material for weaving.

loans.name: Sahar

texts.en:
Sahar is a 47-year-old married Lebanese woman living with her husband and four children, all of whom are still attending school. Her husband is the main income provider in the family; he works on a daily basis in a local company. 

As for Sahar, she opened her own lingerie shop in 2005. She has her loyal customers and knows very well how to stay in a good relationship with them. Today she is requesting to borrow $3000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to diversify her merchandise selection of underwear, pajamas, bridal lingerie, and may other items. In the future, she plans to enlarge her shop to include women's clothes.

loans.use: To diversify her merchandise selection of underwear, pajamas, bridal lingerie, and may other items.

loans.name: Daniela

texts.en:
Daniela is a 27-year-old married woman with two children ages 6 and 5. Daniela is engaged in farming. She grows rice and fruits to sell. Daniela also raises pigs in her backyard. She does her best to support her husband in providing for their needs.

Daniela has requested a loan to purchase pig feeds, fertilizers, and farm inputs. She hopes to have a progressive business in the future. She also hopes to save for her childrens' education.

loans.use: To purchase pig feeds, fertilizers, and farm inputs.

loans.name: Adriana

texts.es:
Con sus tres hijos de 10, 8 y 4 años esta gran emprendedora creó una sala de belleza en su pueblo natal Argelia, ubicado en el Departamento de Antioquia. Negocio con el cual sueña en poder sacar adelante a sus tres pequeños hijos y darle empleo a sus familiares y amigos que tienen difíciles condiciones económicas. 

Con el crédito comprará surtido para poder brindarle un mejor servicio a sus clientes y tener productos para vender en su salón de belleza. Ampliar el negocio es una necesidad sentida de esta mujer tan especial y por eso aprovechará de la mejor forma el crédito obtenido.
texts.en:
With her three children, aged 10, 8, and 4, this really enterprising woman created a beauty salon in her native town of Argelia, in the department of Antioquia.  Her dream is that the business will allow her three little children to succeed as well as bring jobs to her relatives and friends who are in tough economic conditions.  

Adriana will use her loan to buy inventory so she can provide better service to her clientele and have products to sell in her salon.  Expanding her business is a deep necessity for this very special woman so she'll make the most of the loan she gets.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: G.s. Los Coquitos Group

texts.es: Ery  Neftalí y Paz Catalina conforman el grupo solidario Los Coquitos.  Ery se dedica a la venta de ropa y brindar el servicio de triciclo, desde hace mas de 13 años el tiene este medio de vida y al mismo tiempo se ha hecho cargo de sus 5 hijos con las siguientes edades 22, 11, 24, 23 y 19 años. El necesita incrementar su capital de trabajo con el fin de satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de capital trabajo como: pantalones, camisas, faldas, trajes, entre otro tipo de ropa.
texts.en:
Ery Neftali and Paz Catalina belong to the “Los Coquitos” solidarity group. Ery sells clothing and offers tricycle transport services. For more than 13 years he has made his living in this manner and, at the same time, has taken care of his 5 children, aged 24, 23, 22, 19, and 11. 

He needs to increase his working capital in order to satisfy current customer demand. The motive for the loan is to buy merchandise, including pants, shirts, skirts, and suits, among other types of clothing.

loans.use: purchase pants, shirts, skirts, and suits, among other types of clothing to sell.

loans.name: Danilo

texts.en:
Danilo is a 45-year-old fisherman from Trinidad, Bohol. He is married and has two children ages 23 and 21.

Danilo is able to provide for his family through his fishing business. He earns 15000 Philippines pesos (PHP) per month from fishing. He works hard to support his family and improve their living conditions.

Danilo has requested this loan to purchase a boat engine. This will help him be more efficient in his business.

loans.use: To purchase a boat engine.

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es:
Angélica divide su día laboral en dos partes, por la mañana trabaja como operaria agrícola en un cultivo y por las tardes y noches trabaja con su maquina de coser reparando y confeccionando ropa para hombre y mujer. Su clientela va creciendo cada día más por lo que invertirá el crédito en su mayor sueño, poder trabajar de cuenta propia consiguiendo surtido de telas e insumos para confeccionar y si es posible conseguir otra máquina que le permita tener más capacidad para abarcar todos los clientes que le hacen pedidos. 

Esta mujer considera que emprender un negocio es lo mejor que le puede pasar a ella y a su pareja ya que de esa forma puede disponer de más tiempo para buscar otras opciones de obtener más plata y darse una vida más digna.
texts.en:
Angélica divides her working day into two parts: in the mornings she works as an agricultural employee and during the afternoons and evenings she works on her sewing machine making and repairing men and women’s clothing for a clientele that is increasing every day. She will invest the loan in her greatest dream, that of working for herself by obtaining a supply of materials and supplies to make clothes full-time and if possible by obtaining another machine so that she is able to accept all the clients that request her services.

This women believes that starting her own business is the best thing that could happen to her and her partner since in this way she could spend more time looking for other ways to make money and provide a more dignified life for herself.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to make clothing.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa is a married woman with two children. She lives in the town of Trinidad, Bohol with her family. Elsa's husband works as a carpenter.

Elsa has had a sari-sari (variety) store business for three years. She sells coffee, soap, soft drinks, and other various items. Elsa works hard to improve her business. She requested a loan to buy more items to sell such as soft drinks, noodles, and canned goods. Elsa plans to venture into another kind of business in the future.

loans.use: To buy more items to sell such as soft drinks, noodles, and canned goods.

loans.name: Flor Alba

texts.es:
Destacada como una mujer muy emprendedora Flor Alba, desde hace año y medio se dedicó a vender en un pequeño local calzado, camisas, camisetas, pantalones y ropa para niño. Con el crédito espera comprar mucho más surtido para tener un negocio más llamativo y lleno de mercancía y se pueda ver mejor para toda su clientela.

Su sueño es conseguir un local más grande donde pueda prestar un mejor servicio a todos sus clientes y darle empleo a sus hijos mayores y algunos familiares que están desempleados. Sus hijos son su mayor motivación y por eso buscará como sea salir delante de la mano de ellos.
texts.en:
Well-known as a very enterprising woman, Flor Alba has sold footwear, shorts, t-shirts, pants and children’s clothing in a small shop for the past year and a half.  She wants to use the loan to buy much more stock so she will have a more attractive business full of merchandise that will be more appealing to all her clientele.

Her dream is to obtain a larger shop where she can offer better service to all her customers and provide employment for her older children and several relatives who are unemployed. Her children are her greatest motivation and therefore she will look for a way to give them a hand up and a path forward.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Oswaldo

texts.es: Oswaldo.de 32 años de edad,el se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 4 años el nos cuenta que es una actividad que le a gustado mucho porque le gusta la agricultura,el esta solicitando este credito para la compra de abono para su cultivo,ya que nececita comprar para abonar su siembra para que cresca sin plagas,y asi poco poco aumentar sus ventas.
texts.en: Oswaldo is 32 and has been a farmer for four years, he mentions this is an activity he really enjoys because he likes agriculture, he requests this loan to buy fertilizer for his crop so it can grow without infections and this way have higher sales.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for his crop.

loans.name: Eutemia

texts.en:
Eutemia is a sari-sari (variety) store owner from Trinidad, Bohol. She is 51 years old and married. Eutemia sells various items like biscuits, sugar, soap, and canned goods. She is able to help provide for her family's needs through her business.

Eutemia has requested a loan to buy more items to sell such as soft drinks and canned goods. She hopes to expand her store in the future.

loans.use: To buy more items to sell, such as soft drinks and canned goods.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase supplies, basic grains, dairy products and sausages.

loans.name: Irma Nellys

texts.es: Irma Nellys tiene 56 años, su actividad es la venta de ropa y refrescos. Desde hace tiempo le ha gustado luchar para salir adelante. Esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos por lo que se siente agradecida pues es por medio de ellos que ha podido mejorar los ingresos de su hogar. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, trajes entre otros. Ella realiza sus ventas de manera ambulante, pues es así que puede obtener una gran cantidad de clientes diariamente.
texts.en: Irma Nellys is 56 and she sells clothing and beverages. For some time, she has enjoyed fighting to get ahead. This is not the first time she has received funding for which she is grateful since it has made it possible for her to increase her household income. The purpose of this loan is to buy pants, shirts, skirts and suits among other items.  She is a street seller, since this is the way she is able to attract a large number of customers every day.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, skirts and suits among other items.

loans.name: Guzmary

texts.es:
Guzmary pertenece al banco comunal “Choquequirao” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco y sus reuniones con sus compañeras del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la ciudad de Cusco de la provincia de Cusco del departamento del Cusco. 

Guzmary tiene 28 años de edad y  es soltera, ella nació en la ciudad Puno y vive en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realiza sus actividades económicas.  Guzmary  trabaja en una entidad privada en el área de carga y equipaje, ella desempeña la función de supervisora en esta empresa. Gusmary estudio la carrera profesional de Contabilidad y desea el préstamo para los gastos que se necesita para que ella pueda obtener el título profesional de contabilidad. 

Guzmary agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Guzmary is a member of the “Choquequirao” Communal Bank, pertaining to the Arariwa Association of Cusco. Their reunions occur every 30 days in the city, province, and department of Cusco.

Guzmary is 28 years old and single. She was born in the Puno city and lives in Cusco city where she conducts her economic activities. Guzmary works for a private entity in the freight and equipment sector. She is a supervisor in this enterprise. Guzmary is studying for the professional career of accounting and desires a loan to cover the costs of obtaining her professional title in accounting.

Guzmary appreciates and values the loan and is committed to complying with her repayment schedule.

loans.use: cover the costs of obtaining her professional  title in accounting.

loans.name: Julita

texts.en: Julita, who works hard to support her husband in providing for their needs and sending their children to school, has been selling fruits and vegetables to earn a living for three years now. She is requesting a loan to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell, and hopes for her business to prosper. Julita also aspires to have her children finish college and enjoy bright futures.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Henry De Jesús

texts.es:
Con su negocio de venta y engorde de ganado porcino (cerdos), se garantiza un sueldo mensual pero no le da para mantener a sus cuatro hijos y a su esposa que le ayuda en esta ardua tarea diaria. Con el crédito quiere comprar tres cerdos para ampliar así su capacidad de producción lo que le favorece para aumentar sus ganancias.

Su mayor sueño en este momento es poder comprar los corrales y no tener que pedirlos prestados a un amigo que le ayuda para que Henry no incurra en más gastos y pueda así cumplirle a toda su familia.
texts.en:
Henry sells pigs that he has raised. The job guarantees him a monthly income, but it is not enough for him to support his four children and wife who help him with this hard work. With the loan he plans to buy three more pigs and thus increase both production and his income.

Henry’s dream at the moment is to be able to buy his own pig pens and not have to rent them from a friend. He would then have fewer expenses and be able to fulfill his family obligations.

loans.use: to buy three pigs

loans.name: Diana Patricia

texts.es:
Diana pertenece al banco comunal “Choquequirao” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco y sus reuniones con sus compañeras del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la ciudad de Cusco de la provincia de Cusco del departamento del Cusco. 

Diana tiene 22 años de edad y  es soltera, ella nació en la ciudad Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades económicas.  Diana trabaja en una entidad privada como operador radial de taxi. Ya son cuatro años que trabaja y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Diana y su hermano tienen un negocio familiar que consiste en la venta de artesanía de tipo platería. Diana en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales para elaborar sus joyas. 

Diana agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Diana belongs to Asociación Arariwa’s Community Bank in the city of Cusco. The members hold monthly meetings in the city which is part of the province and department of the same name. 

Diana is 22 years old and single. She was born in Cusco and still lives and works there. She works for a private company as a taxi driver. It’s a job she’s held for the last four years and all is going well thanks to the effort she puts into her work. 

Diana and her brother run a family business selling crafts made of silver. She currently needs a loan to buy the materials necessary to make jewelry. She is grateful for this loan which will be very useful and promises to make the scheduled monthly repayments.

loans.use: to buy the materials to make jewelry

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase products for domestic use

loans.name: Ninoska Del Rosario

texts.es: Ninoska Del Rosario se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general. Tiene más de 4 años en su negocio, ella tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. Uno de los obstáculos que ha vencido es la inestabilidad del precio de sus productos. El motivo del crédito que solicita es para la compra de calzado, sabanas, cosméticos, camisas, pantalones, prendas entre otros productos. Ninoska quiere mejorar cada el servicio que brinda a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Ninoska del Rosario sells general merchandise, a job she’s had for four years. She has two young children for whom she is responsible. One obstacle she’s overcome is the unpredictable prices of the products she sells. 

Ninoska needs a loan to buy footwear, sandals, cosmetics, shirts, pants and other clothing. She wishes to improve the service that she offers her customers.

loans.use: to buy footwear, sandals, cosmetics, shirts, pants and other clothing

loans.name: Luz Dary

texts.es: Madre cabeza de familia, Luz Dary hace ocho años trabajaba en cafeterías contando con toda la experiencia para poder montar su propio negocio, así como lo hizo hace ya tres años y con el cual está muy contenta y saliendo adelante. Su mayor sueño es poder ampliar su cafetería y surtirla mucho más de bebidas, licores y algunos comestibles que le piden los clientes constantemente. Prestar un mejor servicio y que los ingresos aumenten para poder seguir pagándole los estudios a su hijo menor es un anhelo muy grande que tiene.
texts.en: Luz Dary is a mother and is the head of her household.  She worked in cafes for 8 years, and with all of this experience she was able to start up her own business 3 years ago.  She is now very pleased with this business and is making progress with it.  Her main dream is to be able to expand her cafe and stock it with more drinks, liquors, and some food items that her customers are frequently asking for.   Her greatest desire is to provide better service and have more income, so that she can continue to pay for the education of her youngest child.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to stock her cafe

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine, a roll of poplin, a pack of threads, a pack of zippers and half a roll of elastic

loans.name: Melchora

texts.es: Melchora es socia del Banco Comunal Buena Suerte, tiene 65 años, es madre de 3 hijos. Su negocio es la venta de Artesanías en la ciudad del Cusco, es socia de Finca desde hace 14 años, los créditos que saca lo invierte siempre en su negocio, ella se siente muy agradecida con Morenita (Fundadora de FINCA Perú) porque le enseñó a invertir bien su dinero, a ahorrar, a dirigir su negocio, a ser puntual y responsable con el dinero y la familia. A Melchora le gusta las charlas que dan en cada reunión. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de lana de Ovino para sus artesanías. Su meta es seguir creciendo para apoyar a sus hijos.
texts.en: Melchora is a member of the communal bank "Buena Suerte."  She is 65 years old, and is the mother of 3 children.  She has a business selling handicrafts in the city of Cusco.  She has been a member of FINCA for 14 years, and she always invests the loans she takes in her business.  She feels very grateful to Morenita (the founder of FINCA Peru), because he taught her to invest her money well, to save, to manage her business and to be punctual and responsible with the money and with her family.  Melchora enjoys the talks that are given at each meeting.  She is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of sheep's wool for her handicrafts.  Her goal is to continue to grow so that that she can support her children.

loans.use: to buy sheep's wool

loans.name: Brenda Carolina

texts.es: Emprendedora, alegre , juvenil y con un gran deseo de su superación se refleja en la Joven de 24 años de edad  llamada Brenda, originaria de León, soltera, estudiante de la carrera de turismo, dueña de un pequeño cyber café. Ella nos expresa la enorme satisfacción y agradecimiento por la oportunidad brindada atravez del préstamo Kiva, el cual utilizo para comprar una impresora/fotocopiadora que la ha ayudado a generar nuevos ingresos por la afluencia de personas es constante solicitándole este servicio en especial los estudiantes de secundaria y universitarios. Siempre con visión de crecer como empresaria ha puesto en su cyber el servicio de mini librería donde oferta artículos escolares. Es por tal motivo que solicita un segundo crédito para la compra de dos computadoras y compra de mercadería para surtir su mini librería. Desea ampliar su local ofreciendo un bue servicio a sus clientes que la haga diferente a los demás por el momento su negocio lo tiene en su casa de habitación pero ve la necesidad de buscar un lugar mas amplio que es por lo cual esta ahorrando para un día llegar a tener capital para tener un local propio.
texts.en:
Entrepreneurialism, joy, youthfulness, and a great desire to succeed are all reflected in this 24-year-old young woman named Brenda.  She is from León and is single.  She is studying for a degree in tourism, and runs a small cyber cafe.  She tells us about her enormous satisfaction and gratitude for the opportunity provided by the Kiva loan.  She used it to purchase a printer/photocopier which helped her to generate more income from the influx of people who constantly request this service, especially students at secondary schools and universities.

With her ongoing vision of growing as a business-woman, she has started a mini-store service in her cyber cafe, where she offers school supplies for sale.  It is for this reason that she is requesting a second loan for the purchase of two computers, and to purchase merchandise to stock up her mini-store.  She wants to expand her premises to offer a good service to her customers which will differentiate her from other cyber cafes.  For now her business is run in her home, but she sees the necessity of looking for a larger location.  This is what she is saving for currently, so that one day she will have capital for having her own premises.

loans.use: to purchase two computers and merchandise for her mini-store.

loans.name: Eduardo Antonio

texts.es: Eduardo compró con su anterior credikiva, muchas cosas, como carnes, refrescos, verduras, salsas, desechables, sillas plásticas y también invirtió en calzado y ropa deportiva que vendió muy bien e invirtió. El se siente muy satisfecho y por eso está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva, para comprar un carro de perros  calientes y un juego de mesas para brindar un ambiente confortable  y de calidad a sus clientes. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: “Que sigan apoyando la gran labor, ya que es muy importante sentir el respaldo de personas que quieren que uno cumpla muchos sueños y metas y con su ayuda está apoyando la construcción de grandes empresas del futuro.”
texts.en:
Eduardo purchased many things with his earlier Kiva loan, such as meat. sodas, vegetables, spices, disposable items, plastic chairs, and also invested in the sports shoes and clothing which sold very well and invested in.  He is very satisfied, and for this reason is applying for a new Kiva loan to purchase a hot-dog cart and a table-game to provide a comfortable and good quality atmosphere for his customers.

His message to the Kiva lenders is as follows: "Continue to support the great work, as it is very important to feel the support of people who want you to fulfill many dreams and goals, and with your help, you are supporting the construction of the large businesses of tomorrow"

loans.use: to purchase a hot-dog cart and table-game to provide a comfortable and good quality atmosphere for his customers.

loans.name: Luz Dary

texts.es:
Dedicada a la venta de mercancía tal como jeans, camisetas y ropa interior para dama y caballero, por su necesidad de generar sus propios ingresos y darle estudio a sus tres hijos, Luz Dary confía en que consiguiendo mucha más mercancía con el crédito obtenido podrá ampliar sus ganancias y mejorar su condición de vida y la de sus hijos. 

Sueña con tener su propio local para vender mercancía en su vereda y en lo posible poder ir a los municipios cercanos para hacer negocios más grandes con algunos almacenes que compren la mercancía más barata y así aumentar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Luz Dary works selling jeans, shirts, and ladies and men's underwear out of her need to generate her own income and pay for her three children's education.  Luz Dary trusts that she will be able to get much more merchandise with the loan, and will be able to increase her earnings and improve her living conditions and those of her children.

She dreams of having her own premises where she can sell merchandise on her own sidewalk, and where possible, to be able to go to the nearby towns to do bigger business with some of the stores that purchase cheap merchandise, and in this way grow her income.

loans.use: to purchase clothes like men and women's underwear

loans.name: Agripina

texts.es:
La señora Agripina tiene 51 años y vive en la aldea de Hicaque en el municipio de Arizona. Ella es madre soltera y tiene dos hijos de 19 y 22 años de edad. Ambos hijos ya se graduaron. Los tres contribuyen a los gastos familiares. 

Desde hace 10 años, Agripina se dedica a la venta de mercadería como lociones, cremas, cosméticos y sandalias. Trabaja 6 horas diarias en su negocio. Empezó con L2000 que le regaló un familiar. Ella iba invirtiendo las ganancias para ir haciendo crecer el negocio. En aquellos tiempos, ella estaba en una situación económica muy crítica y quería sacar sus hijos adelante. El negocio le ha ayudado bastante. 

Solicitó este crédito de L10,000 para la compra de lociones, cremas, sandalias y cosméticos. Su plan y meta es mantener su negocio ya que es su única forma de sustentarse.
texts.en:
Señora Agripina is 51 years old, and lives in the village of Hicaque in the Arizona municipality.  She is a single mother, and has two children aged 19 and 22.  Both her children have already graduated from school.  All three of them contribute to covering the family expenses.

For the last 10 years, Agripina has worked selling merchandise such as lotions, creams, cosmetics and sandals.  She works six hours daily in her business.  She began with L2,000, which was given to her by a relative.  She has been re-investing her earnings to be able to grow her business.  In those earlier times, she was in a very critical financial situation, and wanted to help her children move ahead in life.  Her business has helped her significantly.

She has requested this loan of L10,000 for the purchase of lotions, creams, sandals and cosmetics.  Her plan and goal is to keep her business running, as it is her only form of sustenance.

loans.use: to purchase lotions, creams, sandals, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Fatimata

texts.fr:
Mme  FATIMATA  est mariée  et mère de 04 enfants. Le plus âgé a 21ans et le moins âgé a 17ans. Tous  vont à l’école. Elle a 05 personnes  en charge(ses 04 enfants plus son mari).

Elle vend des pagnes et chaussures  depuis 06ans. Elle s’approvisionne  au marché de secteur 10. Ses clients sont  les femmes et hommes.

Elle veut  s’acheter  10 pagnes, 20 chaussures  et 10 complets.

 Avec  ses bénéfices, elle veut  renforcer  son commerce. Elle ambitionne  ouvrir un autre hangar de vente de pagnes.
texts.en: Mme  FATIMATA is married and the mother of 4 children. The eldest is 21 and the youngest 17 years old. They all attend school. She has five dependents (her four children plus her husband). She has been selling 'pagnes' (traditional cloths) and shoes for 6 years. She buys her stock in the 'secteur 10' market. Her customers are male and female. She wants to purchase 10 'pagnes', 20 shoes and 10 suits. With her profits, she wishes to strengthen her business. Her goal is to open another covered stall selling 'pagnes'.

loans.use: to buy 10 wraps ('pagnes'), 20 shoes and 10 suits

loans.name: Leonila

texts.en:
Leonila is a married woman from Trinidad, Bohol. She has six school-aged children. Leonila's husband is a fisherman.

Leonila has had a sari-sari (convenience) store for six years. She sells various items like noodles, canned goods and soap. Leonila earns 6,000 PHP a month from her business. 

She requested a loan to buy more items to sell such as canned goods and rice. Leonila hopes that her business will grow.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell such as canned goods and rice.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is a 35-year-old married woman with four children. The oldest child is eleven years old. 

Marites has been engaged in farming for seven years. She mainly grows rice crops to sell. Marites has requested a loan to purchase fertilizer and pay for labor. 

Marites hopes that her business will grow and her family's living conditions will improve.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and pay for labor.

loans.name: Maria Nohelia

texts.es:
Desde muy pequeña Maria Nohelia aprendió a trabajar de cuenta suya, sin depender de nadie, por ello es que hace más de 32 años tiene su propia tienda ambulante donde vende dulces, refrescos, cigarrillos. Necesita pagar sus deudas para dejar el negocio libre y poder tener más ganancias que le permitan tener una mejor calidad de vida.

Su más grande sueño es poder ampliar en surtido para prestar un mejor servicio ya que a sus 64 años considera que ser una buena persona y servirle a las personas de la forma que a uno les gusta que lo traten es la mejor manera de conseguir más clientela y así ganar más dinero.
texts.en:
Since she was very young, Maria Nohelia has learned to work on her own account without depending on anyone else.  For this reason, she has had her own street-vending business for more than 32 years, where she sells sweets, sodas, and cigarettes.  She needs to pay her debts to leave her business free, and to be able to have more earnings that will permit her to have a better quality of life.

Her biggest dream is to be able to expand her stock to be able to provide better service.  At 64 years old, she considers herself to be a good person and treats people in the way that she she herself would like to be treated.  This is the best way to get more customers and so earn more money.

loans.use: to purchase stock.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a catalyzer base and epoxy paint, to begin his dream of perfecting his service.

loans.name: Yadir Sujeiry

texts.es:
Madre soltera con tres hijos a su cargo de siete, ocho y catorce años respectivamente. Con grandes sueños Yadir quiere comprar una máquina industrial para poder hacer de mejor manera y con mejor calidad los diferentes productos navideños y artesanías que sabe hacer con mucha perfección como peluches, almohadas, lámparas, entre otros productos que le solicitan sus clientes.

La compra de insumos para poder fabricar sus creaciones es un gran apoyo que se dará con la adquisición del crédito, además de comprar la máquina que le optimizará mucho más los tiempos de fabricación. 

Para ella sus tres hijos son lo más importante y por ello quiere emprender de forma muy organizada su microempresa y le pondrá alma, corazón y vida a su gran proyecto de vida.
texts.en: A single mother with three children in her care who are 7, 8 and 14 years old respectively,  Yadir has big dreams: she wants to buy an industrial sewing machine in order to make the Christmas decorations and crafts that she knows how to make with much perfection still better and with improved quality.  She makes stuffed toys, pillows and lamps, among other products her customers request.  The purchase of supplies to make her creations is a great help that she’ll get thanks to the loan.  Besides, the purchase of the machine will greatly improve the time it takes her to make them.  For her, her three children are most important and this is why she wants to run her micro business in a very organized way; she will put soul, heart and live into her great life project.

loans.use: to buy an industrial sewing machine and supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase products for her bookstore

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Jose Benito

texts.es: José Benito tiene 43 años, su actividad es la compra y venta de ganado. El es una persona responsable y que siempre está pendiente de las necesidades de su familia. Tiene dos hijos de 8 y 11 años respectivamente, como todo padre responsable José no solamente les enseña el ganarse la vida cada día si no que también a ser personas de bien. El motivo de su crédito es para la compra de vacas, toros, chivos y otros. A pesar de que no ha sido fácil salir adelante con su negocio ha logrado brindar a su familia el pan de cada dia.
texts.en: José Benito, 43, is a livestock merchant.  He’s a responsible person who is always watchful of his family’s needs.  He has two children who are 8 and 11 years old respectively.  Like all responsible fathers, José doesn’t just teach them how to earn their daily livelihood but also how to be upstanding citizens.  The reason for his loan is to buy cows, bulls, goats and others.  Despite getting ahead in his business being difficult he’s managed to provide his family with their daily bread.

loans.use: to buy cows, bulls, goats and others.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to stock up on more tennis shoes and shoes for the Christmas season.

loans.name: Hugo Fernando

texts.es:
Hugo es un hombre de 21 años, padre de una niña de tres años. Vive junto a su pareja y su hija en Santo Domingo. Santo Domingo es una ciudad ecuatoriana, capital de la Provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas. Con una población de 305.632 habitantes en 2010 es la cuarta ciudad más poblada del Ecuador, después de Guayaquil, Quito y Cuenca. Santo Domingo se ubica entre la Región Costa y la Región Interandina, por eso, es punto de enlace entre algunas ciudades importantes. Su principal atractivo es la naturaleza, dotada de una alta biodiversidad, en una variedad de ecosistemas que se extienden en una zona con un alto índice de especies endémicas, considerada por científicos ambientales como laboratorio para la investigación genética mundial.

Hugo heredó de sus padres la finca donde reside con su familia. Para vivir cultiva la tierra mientras su esposa se dedica a las labores del hogar y a su pequeña hija. Desea hacer mejoras a su vivienda por lo que necesita un crédito. De esta manera él quiere que su familia viva de mejor. Para pagar su crédito él seguirá en las tareas del campo y así poder sacar adelante su proyecto de vida.
texts.en:
Hugo is a 21-year-old man and the father of a 3-year-old daughter.  He lives with his spouse and daughter in Santo Domingo.  Santo Domingo is an Ecuadorean city, the capital of Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas Province.  

With a population of 305,632 inhabitants in 2010 it is the fourth most populated city in Ecuador after Guayaquil, Quito and Cuenca.  Santo Domingo is located between the Coastal and Inter-Andean Regions so it’s an important communication hub between some important cities.  Its main draw is its natural environment dotted with high biodiversity in a variety of ecosystems that extend in a zone with a high index of native species considered by environmental scientists as a laboratory to study world genetics.

Hugo inherited from his parents the farm he lives on with his family.  To live, he farms the land while his wife tends to household chores and to their little girl.  He wants to do some home improvements and this is why he needs the loan. In this way, he wants his family to live better.  To repay the loan he will continue working in the fields to thus move his life project forward.

loans.use: to do some home improvements.

loans.name: Raul Alberto

texts.es:
Desde hace más de 30 años Raúl se dedica a la venta de mercancía, yendo de pueblo en pueblo vendiendo ropa, accesorios, confites entre otros productos de venta masiva que hacen que donde llegue llame la atención inmediatamente. Utilizando un megáfono hace perifoneo y los clientes se acercan de manera espontánea donde aprovecha para venderles los productos con un estilo jocoso y único por su gran personalidad. 

El crédito lo utilizará para poder comprar más mercancía ya que quiere ir a otros pueblos y municipios y abrir otros mercados. Uno de sus sueños es poder comprar mucho más adelante un carro con el cual pueda cargar más producto y no demorarse tanto en los recorridos entre los pueblos. 

Su familia es su más grande apoyo y por eso este gran ciudadano y emprendedor se esforzará por cumplir con todos los requerimientos que le soliciten sus clientes.
texts.en:
Raúl has been selling merchandise for more than 30 years.  He goes from town to town selling clothes, accessories and sweets, among other products of mass consumption that attracts attention immediately upon his arrival anywhere.  He broadcasts using a megaphone and customers spontaneously approach and he sells to them in a unique, good-humored way that’s his personality.  

He will use the loan to buy more merchandise because he wants to go to other towns and municipalities to open up other markets.  One of his dreams is to be able to buy a car much later on so that he can load more merchandise and not take so long getting from town to town.  His family is his greatest support system and this is why this great and enterprising citizen will strive to meet all the requirements his customers request.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.en:
Nilda is a 49-year-old married woman from Trinidad, Bohol. She sells fresh and dried fish to her community. Nilda earns 4,000 PHP a month from her business. Nilda works hard to support her family.

Nilda is requesting a loan to buy more fish to sell. Nilda hopes that her business will grow. She also hopes that her children will finish college and have bright futures.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Bessy Aracely

texts.es:
La joven Bessy tiene 25 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de San Marcos de Colon, ahi vive con su esposo y su hijo, ella es muy luchadora y muy dedicada a su negocio lo que es produccion y venta de tortillas, actividad que realiza desde hace 7 años, sus clientes son personas de la comunidad y otras que le hacen por pedidos grandes para reuniones o fiestas,  el credito lo utilizara para la compra de los materiales para tener una mayor produccion de tortillas, en estos momentos tiene mas pedidos y no logra salir con todos.
Bessy trabaja muy duro para darle una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo.
texts.en: Bessy, 25, lives in the city of San Marcos de Colon with her husband and son. She’s very tenacious and dedicated to her business which is making and selling tortillas, an activity she’s been in for seven years.  Her customers are people from the community and others who place large orders for parties or get-togethers.  She will use the loan to buy supplies to make larger amounts of tortillas; she currently has more pending orders and can’t quite fill them all.  Bessy works very hard to provide a better quality of life for her son.

loans.use: to buy corn flour, firewood , lime powder and water.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es:
Jaime es un hombre de 30 años que vive en la Ciudadela 20 de Julio, sector del sur de la ciudad de Barranquilla,  que combina empresas, centros comerciales, actividades formales e informales, conjuntos residenciales y viviendas populares, que forman parte de la selecta clientela que compra en el restaurante de Jaime, donde vende desayunos, almuerzos y comidas, típicas, rápidas y corrientes desde el año 2009, cuando dio inicio a esta actividad. Su clientela principal son empleados oficinistas, operarios, vecinos, amigos, familiares y referidos;  tiene dos empleados, maneja una competencia alta, pero se sostiene por calidad, higiene, precios justos y amabilidad en el trato a sus clientes ,  además de estar ubicado en su casa familiar, de esquina, y cerca de grandes superficies comerciales, donde tiene como clientes a empleados.  Sus ventas las realiza de contado y a crédito, con plazos hasta de 15 días. Vive en la casa de su señora madre (quien está en Venezuela), con su esposa, actualmente  con  ocho meses de embarazo y su hijo de cuatro años.
Su sueño de crecimiento empresarial es inagotable y es esta es la razón por la cual está aplicando a un credikiva, su primer crédito en la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, pues desea impactar a su clientela en este fin de año. Con su financiamiento comprará insumos para elaborar comidas especiales, en estas fechas especiales como la Navidad y Año Nuevo.
texts.en:
Jaime is a 30-year-old man living in Ciudadela 20 de Julio in the south part of the city of Barranquilla which combines firms, shopping centers, formal and informal activities, residential complexes and low-cost housing which form part of the select clientele that patronizes Jaime’s restaurant.  He has been selling breakfasts, lunches, dinners, traditional meals, fast food and daily menus since 2009 when he started the business.

His main customers are office workers, employees, neighbors, friends, family members and referred customers.  He has two employees and a high level of competition but he stays in business because of quality, cleanliness, fair prices and the kind customer service he provides.  Besides, it’s located in a family home, on a corner and near large commercial expanses where he has the employees there as customers.  His sales are both cash and credit; he gives up to 15 days to pay.  He lives in his mother’s house (she’s in Venezuela) with his wife who is currently in her eighth month of pregnancy and their four-year-old son.

His dream of business growth is inexhaustible and this is the reason he’s applying for a Kiva loan, his first financing with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, because he wants to impact his clientele this end of year.  He will use the loan to buy ingredients to prepare special meals for the special dates that are Christmas and New Year.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make special meals for special end-of-year festivities.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: Isabel de 64 años está muy satisfecha con su anterior credikiva, pues logró invertir de contado y en mayor volumen mercancías, productos de belleza, botones, calzado, y variedades, que vendió muy rápidamente y a buen precio. Hoy quiere aprovechar las fiestas de fin de año, que llegan con un potencial de crecimiento para su negocio, porque sus clientes incrementan las compras y esta es la razón por la cual está aplicando a su nuevo credikiva, con el cual comprara juguetería, ropa infantil calzado y dulce para responder a sus compradores, con lo que ellos le han sugerido y estará atenta a satisfacerlos con esta inversión que planea ser exitosa como todos los fines de año..
texts.en: Isabel, 64, is very satisfied with her previous Kiva loan because she managed to invest it paying cash for larger amounts of merchandise, beauty products, buttons, footwear and miscellaneous items that she sold quickly and at good prices.  Today, she wants to take advantage of the end of year festivities which bring growth potential for her business because her customers buy more and this is the reason she’s applying for a new Kiva loan that she’ll use to buy toys, children’s clothes, footwear and candy to respond to customer demand and to their suggestions; she will be ready to satisfy them with this investment that she expects will be successful like every other end of year is.

loans.use: to buy toys, children's clothes, footwear and candy.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en:
Rosa is a 33-year-old married woman with five children. The oldest child is 14 years old.

Rosa and her husband run a fishing business in Trinidad, Bohol. She sells her husband's catch at the market. Rosa and her husband work together to improve their business and provide for their needs.

Rosa has requested a loan to purchase a fishing boat and nets. Rosa plans to pay for her children's tuition fees with her profit.

loans.use: to purchase a fishing boat and nets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy 10 outfits made of damask and 30 outfits made of Hytarget traditional cloth.

loans.name: Maria Cecilia

texts.es:
La señora Maria tiene 48 años y vive en en municipio de Choloma. Vive en unión libre con su pareja Marco y ellos tienen un hijo de 12 años, lo cual está estudiando. Marco trabaja junto con Maria en el negocio para cubrir los gastos familiares.  

Maria se especializa en la elaboración y venta de cameras (ropa de cama), cortinas y forros de muebles. Maria tiene un segundo negocio donde elabora y vende tamales en el barrio. Inició sus negocios hace 5 años invirtiendo la liquidación que recibió en su último trabajo. No hay mucha competencia en la zona, así que le ha ido bien en sus negocios. 

Solicitó este crédito de L5500 para la compra de tela y hilo para la elaboración de cameras.
texts.en:
María, 48, lives in the town of Choloma.  She’s in a common law relationship with her spouse, Marco, and they have a 12-year-old son who attends school.  Marco works in the business with María to cover family expenses.

María specializes in making and selling ‘cameras’ (bedspreads), drapes and furniture slipcovers.  María has a second business making tamales to sell around the neighborhood.  She started her businesses five years ago investing her severance pay from a previous job into them.  She does not have much competition in the zone so she’s done well in her businesses.  She requested this L5500 loan to buy fabric and thread to make the ‘cameras.’

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy plastic tables and chairs, juices, cookies, beverages, and diapers in wholesale quantities.

loans.name: Yenis Arsenia

texts.es:
La  joven  Yenis tiene 34 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de pollo frito con tortillas y papas fritas, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en una terminal de buses, por este lugar transitan muchas personas diariamente, esto hace que tenga buenas ventas, muchos la prefieren ya que le da un sabor exquisito al pollo. Yenis es una mujer emprendedora, tiene mas de 4 años con su negocio, todos los dias se levanta a las 6 de la mañana para condimentar el pollo y luego sale de su casa para ir a abrir la pollera.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de pollos, aceite, tortillas, refrescos, condimentos y papas.
La  joven  Yenis  vive  con  su mama y en sus tiempos libres visita la iglesia.
texts.en: Yenis is 34 and sells fried chicken with tortillas and french fries.  Her business is near a bus station with many daily commuters, making for a good client base as people seek out her tasty chicken. Yenis is very hard working and has maintained her business for 4 years, getting up at 6 a.m. every day to season her chicken and open her shop early.  She plans to use this loan to buy chicken, oil, tortillas, potatoes, soft drinks and condiments.  She lives with her mother and in her spare time attends church services.

loans.use: to buy chicken, oil, tortillas, potatoes, soft drinks and condiments

loans.name: Laura Roxana

texts.es: Laura,de 22 años de edad ella se dedica a la venta de productos comestibles de primera nececidad,desde hace 3 años,ella nos cuenta que esta muy contenta porque es una activida que le gusta mucho,ademas de ser una entrada economica para ayudar a su familia,ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de productos comestibles,ya  que de esa forma lograra aumentar su mercaderia.
texts.en: Laura is 22 years old and has worked selling basic food products for the past three years.  She tells us that she is very happy because she likes her work very much, and in addition her work has provided an economic opening to help her family.  She is asking for a loan in order to buy food products since in that way she can increase her sales.

loans.use: To purchase food products

loans.name: Mildrey María

texts.es: La señora Mildrey a sus 28 años de edad es madre de un hijo de 8 años, trabaja en semana vendiendo pautas publicitarias de un periódico del corregimiento de san Félix ubicado al norte de Antioquia; paralelo a este trabajo y con el animo de tener mayores ingresos, la señora Mildrey arrendó hace seis meses un local en el cual trabaja de viernes a domingo ofreciendo servicios de venta de licor. La señora Mildrey requiere de la compra de licor tal como cerveza, además gaseosa y snacks con el fin de tener su negocio con mayor variedad y surtido. El sueño de la señora Mildrey es tener su propia tienda e independizarse de tiempo completo en su propio negocio para poder compartir mucho más tiempo con su hijo.
texts.en:
Señora Mildrey is 28 years old, and the mother of an 8-month-old son.  During the week, she works selling advertising for a newspaper in San Félix, which is located to the north of Antioquia.  Alongside this work, and with the intent of earning greater income, Señora Mildrey has rented premises for the last six months where she works from Friday through Sunday selling liquor.  

Señora Mildrey wants to purchase alcoholic beverages such as beer, also sodas and snacks, with the end goal of having more variety in her business and being better stocked.  

Señora Mildrey's dream is to have her own store and to work full-time independently in her own business, so that she can spend much more time with her son.

loans.use: to stock up on alcoholic beverages.

loans.name: Delia Maria

texts.es:
la joven Delia tiene 26 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de san marcos de colon, ahi vive con sus hijos y su esposo, Delia es una mujer luchadora y dedicada a su negocio propio que es la venta de botas, actividad que realiza desde hace 3 años, cerca de este lugar hay muchas fincas de ganado y caballos, esto hace que este tipo de calzado tenga buena demanda, tiene clientes que le encargan todas las semanas. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de botas.
Delia trabaja fuerte dia a dia para hacer crecer su negocio y poder tener una mejor calidad de vida para ella y para su familia.
texts.en:
Delia is 26 and lives in San Marcos de Colon with her husband and children,  Delia is hardworking and dedicated to her business; she sells boots and has done so for 3 years.  In her region there are many cattle and horse farms, so stylish boots are in high demand.  Every week she receives client orders and this credit will allow her to increase her stock of boots.  
Delia works hard every day to grow her business and to provide a better living standard for her family.

loans.use: to buy cowboy boots

loans.name: Luz María

texts.es: Doña Luz, originaria de León, de oficio comerciante alegre, dinámica y preparándose para la época navideña encontramos a  Luz, acomodando su pulpería para las ventas del día. El cambio que ha vivido atravez del préstamo Kiva ha sido muy positivo para su vida y negocio pues logro uno de sus objetivos surtir su pulpería e invertir en compra de ropa nueva para vender las ventas han ido mejorando pues comprobó que al invertir en variedad de productos de mucha necesidad la afluencia de clientes es mas continua y los ingresos mejora a pesar del alza de los precios que se sufre constantemente pero aun ha si el negocio se administra bien se puede ver buenos cambios.
